headline: ERI’s John Shegerian Describes the Evolving Circular Economy at 2025 ITAD Summit
summary: LAS VEGAS, August 08, 2025--John Shegerian, Chairman and CEO of ERI, the nation’s first carbon neutral resource recovery, ITAD, mobility and data destruction/processing provider, participated in the Day 2 opening panel conversation on the circular economy last week at the ITAD Summit at the Bellagio Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas. The discussion was emceed by Darrell Fleming-Kendall, the Events Manager and Special Projects Director for the ITAD Summit, and the panel featured experts Shegerian from
